abbot.finder

Class BasicFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • abbot.finder.BasicFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentFinder

    public class BasicFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentFinder
    Provides basic component lookup, examining each component in turn. Searches all components of interest in a given hierarchy.
